timeline.message:
Add instrumentation to propagate across scala promises properly

There were significant changes in 2.13, so that required completely separate instrumentation.

Add scala promise instrumentation to various projects

To verify compatibility
Add instrumentation to ensure that the play 2.3 test doesn't hang on the first request
Add promise test for completable future.

Add instrumentation to CompletableFuture to support proper context propagation.

TODO: CompletableFutureTest still needs to be updated since several tests fail with this new instrumentation.

Ask the right class loader for classes in the java package that we don't have

Since we now inject classes into to `java.*` pacakge we need to delegate
all the classes that we don't find in those packages to the `super.loadClass`
method to not fail loading regular classes from the `java.*` packages.
Enable force rerun of tests with property
Allow Instrumenter to disable field injection and wrapping for types
Allow Instrumenter to disable field injection and wrapping for types
Exclude otel 0.9.0 that started failing muzzle
